Title: Cooper's Dreams
Plot: Cooper and company have tea with the Log Lady.  The Log Lady tells them there was a third man following after Leo and Jaques the night Laura died.  At the cabin of Jaquces Renault, Cooper, Hawk and Truman find Waldo the bird.  The bird not only attacked Laura the night she died, but he can also talk.  Cooper finds a poker chip from One Eyed Jacks.  Hank returns home to Norma.  The Briggs family visits Dr. Jacoby.  Audrey takes a job at the perfume counter where Laura and Ronette worked.  Shelly
GuestStars: Brian Straub, Mary Stavin, Rick Giolito, Peter Michael Goetz
